title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to elicit, document, and analyze project requirements for the EcoEnergyCellPhone. Ensure feasibility, alignment with project goals, and consider edge cases, error handling, maintainability, modularity, scalability, and performance optimizations. Involve task-decomposer to break down the tasks, once requirements are finalized.

title: Design Concept Development
description: Develop a conceptual design for the EcoEnergyCellPhone considering ambient energy harvesting and power-sharing capabilities.

title: Component Selection and Specification
description: Research and select appropriate components for the energy harvesting system and power-sharing features.

title: Hardware Prototype Creation
description: Construct a working hardware prototype of the EcoEnergyCellPhone that demonstrates energy harvesting and power-sharing capabilities.

title: Energy Harvesting Software Development
description: Develop the software component responsible for energy harvesting in the EcoEnergyCellPhone.

title: Power-Sharing Software Development
description: Develop the software component responsible for power-sharing in the EcoEnergyCellPhone.

title: Integration Testing and Validation
description: Test the integration of hardware components and software modules in the EcoEnergyCellPhone.

title: User Interface Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the user interface for the EcoEnergyCellPhone, focusing on ease of use and displaying key features.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Manual
description: Write clear documentation and user manuals for the EcoEnergyCellPhone, including assembly instructions and usage guidelines.

title: Production Readiness and Quality Assurance
description: Ensure the EcoEnergyCellPhone is ready for mass production, addressing any quality issues or production bottlenecks.
